DOC.brief_summary: To see if removing the omentum in addition to a gastric bypass improves diabetes is better than just a gastric bypass.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial of Laparoscopic Gastric Bypass Plus Omentectomy Versus Laparoscopic Gastric Bypass Alone in Improving Diabetic Indices
DOC.criteria: undergoing laparoscopic gastric bypass, >18 yo, understands english previous lower pelvic surgery, selfpay patients, previous weight loss surgery,
